title: mkv2castUI
description: Modern web application for converting MKV video files to Chromecast-compatible formats with real-time progress tracking and hardware acceleration support.
name: mkv2castui

env.name: REQUIRE_AUTH
env.label: Require Authentication
env.description: Enable OAuth authentication (true/false). Set to false for local mode.

env.name: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
env.label: Django Secret Key
env.description: Secret key for Django (generate with: openssl rand -hex 32)

env.name: DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS
env.label: Allowed Hosts
env.description: Comma-separated list of allowed hosts (e.g., localhost,example.com)

env.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
env.label: Google OAuth Client ID
env.description: Google OAuth client ID (optional if REQUIRE_AUTH=false)

env.name: GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
env.label: Google OAuth Client Secret
env.description: Google OAuth client secret (optional if REQUIRE_AUTH=false)

env.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_ID
env.label: GitHub OAuth Client ID
env.description: GitHub OAuth client ID (optional if REQUIRE_AUTH=false)

env.name: GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET
env.label: GitHub OAuth Client Secret
env.description: GitHub OAuth client secret (optional if REQUIRE_AUTH=false)

env.name: MKV2CAST_DEFAULT_HW
env.label: Hardware Acceleration
env.description: Hardware acceleration backend (auto, cpu, vaapi, qsv, nvenc)

env.name: MKV2CAST_MAX_FILE_SIZE
env.label: Max File Size (bytes)
env.description: Maximum upload file size in bytes (default: 10737418240 = 10GB)

env.name: USE_S3
env.label: Use S3 Storage
env.description: Use external S3-compatible storage instead of local volumes

note: mkv2castUI requires at least 4GB RAM and 20GB disk space. For hardware acceleration, ensure GPU devices are accessible to the container.
